summary: An FBI email from August 20, 2019, regarding updates to the interview schedule for the Epstein case and containing an attached spreadsheet of Bureau of Prisons (BOP) employees and their association with the case. The email is sent by a Special Agent from the FBI New York Field Office's Violent Crimes Task Force.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force
persons.context: Author of the email providing updates on interview schedules and attaching a spreadsheet of BOP employees associated with the Epstein case.

events.title: FBI email regarding interview schedule and BOP employee spreadsheet
events.description: An FBI Special Agent sends an email updating the schedule for interviews related to the Epstein case and attaches a spreadsheet detailing BOP employees and their association with the case.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force

keyFacts: The FBI was actively conducting interviews related to the Epstein case as of August 2019.
A spreadsheet was compiled detailing Bureau of Prisons (BOP) employees and their association with the Epstein case.
The email indicates coordination within the FBI's Violent Crimes Task Force in New York regarding the investigation.
